body_html: @akorzh I tried building with python3 on Ubuntu 16.04 and the build finished correctly. I have to link /usr/bin/python3 to /usr/bin/python but other than that the build works fine. Could you list the detailed steps and environment (as was suggested in the pull request template) so that the issue could be reproduced?

body: @akorzh I tried building with python3 on Ubuntu 16.04 and the build finished correctly. I have to link `/usr/bin/python3` to `/usr/bin/python` but other than that the build works fine. Could you list the detailed steps and environment (as was suggested in the pull request template) so that the issue could be reproduced?
